body:
Hey everyone.

i have decided to step down and move on from my life after 9 months as a staff member.

So long to everyone, I probably won't be checking the forums or playing anymore.

thank you.
body_tagged:
Hey everyone.

i have decided to step down and move on from my life after 9 months as a staff member.

So long to everyone, I probably won't be checking the forums or playing anymore.

thank you.

replies.body:
Im not sure if you will see this Nolan... but I really really liked the Sistahood days, you were someone really professionnal (never using smileys) and fun to talk to. :)

I remember the day I told you I was going to leave Avicus, you said "Nooooo D: You were a great Avicus member.. I'm sad to see you leave! :(". 

So... with that said, good luck with anything you do in life! It's tough out there.
